title: An Angel Standing in the Sun and Birds Invited to the Repast
description: An Angel Standing in the Sun and Birds Invited to the Repast; Unknown; London (probably), England; about 1255 - 1260; Tempera colors, gold leaf, colored washes, pen and ink on parchment; Leaf: 31.9 x 22.5 cm (12 9/16 x 8 7/8 in.); Ms. Ludwig III 1, fol. 40v; J.
